title: Can we use University of Karachi prayer timing calculations for Isha?
transcript: consider subscribing uh nasra from the us um so yesterday i asked um if there was another timetable that we could use um besides umakura for isha and you said um you know university of karachi so is that one like one that we can use for aisha while using umakura for the rest for for the rest of the prayers correct okay thank you you're welcome you
